data.title: TPMCalculator
data.description: TPMCalculator quantifies mRNA abundance directly from the alignments by parsing BAM files
data.name: TPMCalculator

evidence: README container command: "docker run -v /path_to_data:/data --user=yourUID:your:GID biocontainers/tpmcalculator:0.0.1 TPMCalculator -g /data/path_to_GTF/genes.gtf -b /data/path_to_bam/sample1.bam"
Owner is NCBI and README states: "## National Center for Biotechnology Information. This software is a "United States Government Work""
"TPMCalculator quantifies mRNA abundance directly from the alignments by parsing BAM files." and describes command-line usage, indicating it is an end-user analysis tool.
